title: Screen resolution help
body: So I've been playing league for a very long time. I've been using my resolution I always have been using. All of a sudden it says "cannot display this video mode, change computer display input to 1680x1050" hehe sry for my potato but if I put it on 1680x1050 I lag but if I lower it to 1024x768(the lowest I can) what shows above pops up? Is there a reason why this happens as I lower my resolution? Another note, when I increase it the problem still persists

replies.body:
It sounds like you're experiencing the known bug with Fullscreen resolutions in 7.1 listed on the [**Service Status Page.**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/) You hit the *Alt+Tab* keys at the same time once you enter the loading screen to workaround this issue.

Let me know if you have any questions!
